penguins = Datasets::Penguins.new

# sin-cos-tan

```{ruby}
charty = Charty::Plotter.new(:gruff)
```
```{ruby}
curve = charty.curve do
  function {|x| Math.sin(x) }
  range x: 0..10, y: -1..1
  xlabel 'foo'
  ylabel 'bar'
end
curve.render("sample_images/sin.png")
```

```{ruby}
curve = charty.curve do
  function {|x| Math.cos(x) }
  range x: 0..10, y: -1..1
  xlabel 'foo'
  ylabel 'bar'
end
curve.render("sample_images/cos.png")
```

```{ruby}
curve = charty.curve do

end

```
